transcript:
Customer: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir?
Executive: Ji, haan aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji, mai ye keh raha hu ki sir, jo aap mujhe whatsapp pe details bhej dijiye. Ye to mai internal team se check karata hu, kyuki verified devices hoti hai, to wo bhi hume proper clarity degi ki kya issue hai. Aur sir ki jo buyer aapko saamne se inquiry aur call kar rahe hai na, to abhi mai dekh raha tha sir ki calls wagera sir aap uthate nahi hai inke buyer ki.
Customer: Abhi, abhi kaise karu yaar? Abhi kal aaya, maine kal call receive kiya. Parso call aaya, parso call receive kiya, kaise karu mai?
Executive: Sir dekhiye, aapne kari hui hai sir November me. October ki agar mai aapko batau, to October me aapke paas takreeban 12 calls aayi hui thi sir. Aur 12 me se kabhi receive nahi hui thi aapke site se sir. Aur isse pehle bhi September me 16 calls thi sir. 16 se paanch aapne receive kari thi aur baaki 11 aapne miss kar di thi sir.
Customer: Sir, aap theek keh rahe hai. Aisa hota hai, jaise call aaya. Ab call me mere haath me mobile nahi hai, hum keh dete hai, to call receive nahi hoti hai, kam nahi ho pata. Aur mere haath me mobile hai to mai utha leta hu.
Executive: Isme to teen paanch number add karne ka option milta hai IndiaMART me. Agar aap chahe to teen chaar number aur add kar sakte hai aapke andar. Kam se kam, sir dekhiye calls jo hoti hai sir, wo itni important hoti hai ki buyer aapki profile pe us time rehta hai. Aur usko aapka koi bhi product achha lag raha hota hai ya samajh me aa raha hota hai tab tak wo directly call karta hai sir aapko. To call wali list ko to mai ye kahunga ki aap aur calling use kar sakte hai sir. Usme itna achha business milta hai aapko.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: To call mai suggest karunga ki ek bhi call mat miss kiya kijiye. Chahe aap busy bhi ho sir, to aap ek baar buyer se call receive karke usse bol diya kijiye ki mai aapko thodi der me call kar raha hu. Taki buyer kisi aur supplier ke paas jaake usse contact na kar le. Usko lage ki aap respond hi nahi kar rahe. To badnami me aap jaante hi hai sir aur dusre supplier hai.
Customer: Abhi mai parso ek inquiry thi, uske baad maine ek baahar se baat kiya. Ab wo mere ko bolta hai, ye call kiya hai. Ab dekhta kuch aur hai, maangta kuch aur hai. Iske saamne to kuch discount me karu iske saath me baat karunga. Kyuki maine usse bol diya, maine kaha dekhta tha, ab mai kal call me le lunga, mai call karunga. Maine usse bol diya uske baad, wo na dil se baat karega, uske baad mai call karta hu, mai nahi bolte.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ji, ji, wahi keh raha hu. Aapka phone [unintelligible] pe hai na, ye aisa nahi hai maine call ko dekh ke buyer kar raha hu. Wo kuch, kuch dekhta kuch aur hai, maangta kuch aur hai. Aisa bhi hota hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ab aap to, aap dekhiye, jo customer ko baithta hai na, usko acche se bolna tha. Aapne bola nahi, kaha jo ekdum close ho jaata hai bas. Wo dekhta kuch aur hai, maangta kuch aur hai. Nahi, waha pe jab tak koi customer hi kaam nahi hoga to samjho aap, mere ko bilkul bhi haan, isme wo wahi sahi hai.
Executive: Sir, mai 50-50 ka chance leke rehta hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi, to aap sab dekho sir kya hota hai na ki buyer agar thoda sa dekh raha hai aapke catalog visit kar raha hai, to it means wo visit aapko call tabhi kar raha hai jab wo aapki profile pe aata hai. Kyuki number to hum wahi daalte hai aapki profile pe.
Customer: [unintelligible] ye baat bata rahe hai.
Executive: Ji, to wo profile se thoda sa interested wo buyer isi wajah se hota hai sir, kyuki is baar call me mai matlab aur supplier se baat karta hu sir, to wo log kya batate hai mujhe ki jo aadmi direct call aur direct inquiry ke through unke paas aata hai, sabse jyada business wahi log unko deke jaate hai. To aap jaise call ka to abhi aap receive kijiyega to aap mujhe bataiyega. Lekin aap ye bataiye sir ki message ke through bhi aapke paas bahut saare buyer inquiry kar rahe hai. To usme kya sir response aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Wo aata hai na jo message se hum lete hai, wo [unintelligible] hai aur [unintelligible] hai. Bata to sakte hai na kuch ek inquiry nahi hai. Kal ko kuch aise bhi hai, wo sab koi [unintelligible] hai, uske baad [unintelligible].
Executive: Sir, aapki aawaz us waqt jyada cut ke aa rahi hai sir. Hello.
Customer: Sir, kya baat hai kya sir?
Executive: Haan, haan, mai connect kar raha hu abhi.
Customer: Accha, aap mujhe bataiye kis time aap free rahenge jis time office ko visit kare ya kis time [unintelligible].
Executive: Aap jis time free nahi rahenge na, wo jayega time, mujhe pata lag jayega. Mai jis time office se mujhe shaam ho jayega, paanch, chhe baje ho jayega, tab tak aap free ho jayenge.
Customer: Paanch, chhe baj jayega.
Executive: Haan, agar aap call kar sakte honge, saare paanch baje call karo, phir hum discuss kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai, mai 5:30 baje ek baar call kar lunga kyuki aawaz bhi bahut jyada cut ke aa rahi hai aur dusri cheez abhi aap mujhe wo whatsapp pe un leads ki details bhejiye jin leads ke baare me abhi abhi aapne mujhe bataya hai. Unki recording ke saath saath aap saari details mujhe share kijiye. Mai yaha se abhi internal team me [unintelligible] kar raha hu.
Customer: [unintelligible] meri baat suniye. Mai recording isliye nahi de sakta hu mere paas iPhone hai. iPhone me recording nahi hota hai. Mai recording [unintelligible].
Executive: Nahi, sir, aisa hota hai sir.
Customer: Nahi hota hai wo, aap pata kar lena nahi hota hai.
Executive: Nahi, sir, mere paas bhi iPhone hi hai, mai to recorded line pe hi call karta hu sir.
Customer: iPhone pe kaise hota hai batana mere ko.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiyega ek mic ka option aata hai sir, ek mic ka option aata hai. Jaise hi aap us pe click karte hai, automatically recording start ho jaati hai sir.
Customer: Mic ka option aata hai to mic me to message likha hua hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi, wo aise matlab jaise nahi hota hai sir, ICU me jaise lines bani rehti hai, waise hi lines bani hongi. Uspe jaise hi aap click kijiyega na to recording start ho jaati hai.
Customer: Mujhe nahi aa raha bhai, kaha pe hai batao.
Executive: Jaise abhi call chal rahi hai sir aapki?
Customer: Haan, call chal rahi hai tabhi to aapse baat kar raha hu mai.
Executive: Ji, ji, wahi keh raha hu. Upar dekhiye left side me ek option bana hoga, upar left side me sir.
Customer: Nahi kuch nahi hai, mere me option nahi bana hua hai.
Executive: Theek hai, mai aapko screenshot deke bhejta hu. Aap mujhe whatsapp pe bhejiye ga to mai aapko screenshot bhejta hu.
Customer: Aap whatsapp chalo, whatsapp pe [unintelligible].
Executive: Ji, ji, mai whatsapp kar raha hu aur aap ek baar 5:30 baje aapko connect karke mai inform karta hu.
Customer: Abhi theek hai, whatsapp par mai inform karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay, thank you.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving calls from buyers.

- Customer says some buyers ask for different products.

- Customer unable to locate recording option on iPhone.



Resolution:

- Executive shared benefits of receiving calls.

- Executive suggested adding multiple numbers.

- Executive will share screenshot of recording option.

- Executive will connect at 5:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share screenshot on WhatsApp.

- Executive will call back at 5:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, recording, whatsapp, profile
